ModMetaData.name: ED-CheatReactor
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 03.00.01 Discussion, Non Steam Downloads and GitHub Repositories of this mod is available at: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=18995 Please Use that Thread for Discussion / Feedback that would like me to reply to. Ideally Bugs should be logged on GitHub although in the discussion thread is also fine.
Adds a Reactor that produces a lot of Power, is Built Instantly and for Free. It goes without saying that this is in no way balanced and should only be used for testing or cheating.
I know that there is a debug power option in the menu, but I find this more helpful for testing some things.
